definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
alcohol/ethanol CH3CH2OH/ethyl alcohol/also written 乙醇/grain alcohol
baijiu, a spirit usually distilled from sorghum
heavy drinking/to get drunk/to drink to excess

sentences.english: He likes a drink when he returns home from work.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡放工回家後喝一杯酒。

sentences.english: O, boy! Is Last night's wine of Loess Plateau sweet?
sentences.chinese: 男孩啊，黃土高坡昨夜的酒，可好。

sentences.english: The new government imposed a special tax  on imported wines.
sentences.chinese: 新政府對進口酒徵收特別稅。

sentences.english: The judge enjoined him from selling alcohol.
The finish is long and supple. Creamy pasta dishes, quiches or with cheese.
sentences.chinese: 這款酒是奶油意大利麪或奶酪的最佳搭配。

sentences.english: And with that he finishes the man's drink in one gulp .
sentences.chinese: 他話一說完，就把男子的酒一飲而盡。

sentences.english: They make drinking a habit and cannot live without it.
sentences.chinese: 他們嗜酒成性，沒有酒就活不下去。

sentences.english: Concentrate on those who have bought drinks and are still loitering at the bar.
sentences.chinese: 注意那些已經買了酒可還在吧檯前晃盪的人。

sentences.english: When guests enter Miao people's village, they often meet road-block drinks.
sentences.chinese: 客人進苗寨時，往往遇到攔路酒。

sentences.english: In most British pubs, you have to go to the bar to buy drinks.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數英國酒吧，你得親自到吧檯去買酒。

sentences.english: You don't want to have to think too much. Your job is just to relax and vegetate.
sentences.chinese: 你不想喝太多酒，你只想去放鬆下，清閒下。

sentences.english: How many tax-free cigarettes and wines can I take if I travel to UK?3.
sentences.chinese: 叨教可以免稅攜帶多少香菸和酒？

sentences.english: I've never had alcohol before and was very excited.
sentences.chinese: 我之前從來沒沾過酒，所以很興奮。

sentences.english: Yet, the drinks that burnt my throat became the story of our past, each in my mind, crystalized.
sentences.chinese: 但是入口的酒卻變成往事，一一在我心頭永恆。

sentences.english: This wine goes very well with the steamed fish.

definition: name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
to ferment/to brew/to make honey (of bees)/to lead to/to form gradually/wine/stuffed vegetables (cooking method)
baijiu, a spirit usually distilled from sorghum
"yellow wine" (mulled rice wine, usually served warm)
